item.title: Get Results from an Android Mobile Marketing Strategy
item.description: Android Mobiles are taking over the world … and that seems to be supported by the latest statistics or _trends. _If you’re thinking about mobile marketing .. and wondering ‘what is all the fuss about Android’, then this presentation is for you. Only the latest Android Insights and Statistics 10 billion app downloads (December 2011) 200 million activated devices (November 2011) 400,000 Android Apps (December 2011) We can only wait for the next Google I/O conference to confirm how these numbers are growing!

item.title: Customer Service via Web & Email – Who didn’t test your web mail form O2
item.description: Well hello Customer Service and Customer Management consultants … who here is reading this and is building a business case for improved customer service by moving customers to self care tools such as web forms and e-mail? Most of you reading this are probably think about it constantly. THEN DON’T DO IT unless you’ve gone and tested it and got it right. I recently got an iPad 2 – an upgrade from my first iPad … Some nice marketing product person at O2 figured out an email with a link to reset the iPad MAC address so I can continue to use free wifi would be helpful.

item.description: What shortcuts or widgets should you save to the desktop of you Anrdoid phone? item.title: Android Market would benefit Developer instead of Apple App Certification?
item.description: Develop apps for Android or develop mobile apps for Apple, some days its hard to figure out just what to do. On this website I’ve written a lot on Android phones and apps.Around 6000 apps have been removed from the Apple store recently due to their erotic nature. It’s not that Android Market has no quality control – Adult or Erotic does not exist as a content category in Android Market but dating apps or other soft-porn apps so far have not shown huge growth (ahem) on Android.

item.title: 5 Essential tips for promoting your charity or cause using mobile marketing
item.description: For non-profit organisations, charities and cause related marketing the mobile can provide the best integrated marketing solution for campaigns. item.title: Where to start building mobile apps for large screens – mobile agencies beware
item.description: Where to start with building a mobile app or going mobile has been a popular topic for some time. Many FMCG brands and agencies are requesting only quotes for mobile apps – forgetting the less popular java app or branded mobile game. At the expense of budget – haha – focusing on a mobile app can be a costly exercise starting from about 10k to 100k plus. Marketing Agencies and their Brands need to go and reconsider their mobile strategy – and if you’ve already built a mobile app – you maybe disappointed how it looks on the larger screen devices.

item.title: Gartner Says Consumers Will Download 4,500,000,000 Mobile Apps in 2010
item.description: This week Gartner reported that consumers will spend a headline figure of £3.8 billion pounds ($6.2 billion USD) in mobile apps during this year. The forecast estimates total downloads to be 4,500,000,000. The numbers are eye wateringly large. Gartners forecast goes on to mention that 82 per cent of downloads would be free apps … leaving 18 per cent of downloads to come up with cash. 4.5 billion downloads is quite staggering – even if Apple is set to announce its about to hit its 3 billionth download.
